Class AddDropController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Control.AddDropController

  • public class AddDropController
extends java.lang.Object
    An AddDropController class that facilitates with the Add and Drop of courses
    Since:
    2017-04-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ameen, Ashiq, Will, Reuben, Waqas

    • Method Detail

      • addMethod

        public boolean addMethod(java.lang.String courseCode,
                         int index,
                         java.lang.String matricNum)
        A method for a student to add and drop method based on the CourseCode,Course Index and the students matriculation number.If the course is full,the person is automatically added into the waitlist.
        Parameters:
        courseCode - The course code the student which is to enroll into
        index - The index of the course which the student prefers.E.g.CE2003_2 where 2 refers to the index
        matricNum - The matriculation number of the student
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, either true when method is is able to add a course/add a person to a waitlist.False if otherwise.

        Parameters:

        list - Takes in a List which consists of the List
        courseCode - The course code of a course
        index - The index of the course.E.g,CE2003_2 where 2 refers to the index

        public void studentAddsCourse(java.lang.String filename,
                              java.util.List list,
                              java.lang.String courseCode,
                              int index)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        A method that adds a student enrolled in a course into a file
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name of where the data should be written
        list - A list of student to be added into the course
        courseCode - The course code of a particular course
        index - The index of the course.E.g,CE2003_2 where 2 refers to the index
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an exception to the method which calls this method in the event,there is a problem reading the file

      • readAllCourseAndStudent

        public static java.util.ArrayList readAllCourseAndStudent(java.lang.String filename)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        A method that reads all students enrolled in the course given a filename
        Parameters:
        filename - The name name of the file where data should be read from
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of students who are enrolled to the particular course
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an exception to the method which calls this method where the reading fails

      • dropMethod

        public void dropMethod(java.lang.String courseCode,
                       int index,
                       java.lang.String matricNum)
        This method allows a student to drop a course and checks whether there are any students in the waitlist if there are students in the waitlist.The first student from the waitlist will be added to the course automatically and triggers an email instantly to the latter that he has been enrolled in the course.
        Parameters:
        courseCode - Course of the particular course
        index - The index of the course.E.g,CE2003_2 where 2 refers to the index
        matricNum - The matriculation number of the student

        Parameters:
        matriculationNum - The matriculation number of the student
        courseCode - The course code of a particular
        Returns:
        returns the index in the form of an integer

                                                    java.lang.String courseCode,

        public boolean AddMasterCheck(java.lang.String matricNum,
                              java.lang.String courseCode,
